entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
